string.text: This section is an encyclopedia. During the game information about the world will be recorded here and be sorted by topic.
Encyclopedia
PDA of a bandit from the factory
Dealer: climb to the checkpoint and from there to steal the briefcase with the report of the military expedition from the North Zone.
CCP a dead beginner

Fan: to Help fight back against the mercenaries, who came and demanded the newcomers to liberate the camp. All are to the eye not to get caught, let the mercenaries in the camp, and then on command we attack.
CCP Explorer
Meeting with Dr.
Doctor: I'll be waiting for a person from Arrow in the cache grouping Arrow. If it is his - he knows the place.
Okay, I'll meet a Ghost. I'll wait for it in the cache Arrow. If it's someone of their own, so knows where to find me. Doctor.

Merchant: "... my guys were returning from a mission and disappeared. One of them is to call Nimble - getting me some info... And lost very close at hand, because the bridge is gone. Don't know what to think. In short: find bright-eyed, alive or dead - most importantly, the flash drive when it was. Will bring to me. Nimble was of the people of the Wolf and this here, in the camp. Ask him to know something. C weapons and ammunition he will help you."
Gray - Fox: a friend asked to meet a group of stalkers, dug out the cache Arrow, I'll be with my people at the dump in the hangar, if that is right on.
One bro left yesterday for exploration in the abandoned mill, and about it still heard nothing. We ought to go find out where he is.
Wolf: bring the dynamite, stale bandits at the factory. To help - under the bridge the scouts, to approach, to say "greetings from hell" - the password. Lead them in the attack.
Wolf: to clear out the bandits at the factory with the help of my scouts over the bridge, then come and report.
PDAs of dead stalkers
... woke up in a kennel at some guy, I can't remember. Only the PDA and a picture of some guy. In KPK one entry is to kill the Arrow.
Trader: back from the RAID, the Fox asks for help. Might know about direction.
Fox: Grey, sits in a hangar at the dump, he knows more about the shooter.
Dealer: NII Agroprom the military to steal the results of the expedition and carry in bar "100 x-ray", the bartender.
CCP Fox

Diary Of A Fraction. The dealer sent to follow the military to the Institute Agroprom. Cornered, all the shooting, the bandits and the military. Got something interesting, give the rest to the code *Abracadabra, the type of the cipher*
Gray - Fox: a friend asked to meet a group of stalkers, dug out the cache Arrow, I'll be at the dump if I come.
PDA Bit
Dealer: here "near field" anomalies "Chopper". The artifact at its center. To get.
There's some very strange anomaly. It looks like it moves. I will try to calculate its trajectory and move, because to pay the soldiers on a bridge over pass of I have no money.
I left on an abandoned farm a small stash. There is a little food, cartridges. To bear can not, of any strength. Not sure if I'll be able to get to camp.
